english.segment1: Intoxicating You are to me. Illuminating You are to see. Truly breathtaking You are to breathe. Sending my head spinning You are, You see
english.segment2: And I've lost my mind, I'm sure to find. Need to apologize for my. Lack of inhibition, for my belligerent condition. But with You this near I'm dizzy
english.segment3: Inebriating You are to me. Completely captivating You are yo see. Sending my world spinning You are, You see
english.segment4: And now I find a blurry line. Here between You and I. Raise the cup, drink 'til I'm full. Sing 'til I can't, 'til my voice is gone. And my head is spinning
english.segment5: Chorus: La, la dee da. La dee da, dee da. Dee da da da. Hey la, la dee da. La dee da, dee da. Dee da da da
english.segment6: Illuminating You are to see. Truly breathtaking You are to breathe. Sending my head spinning You are, You see
english.segment7: And now I find a blurry line. Here between you and I. Raise the cup, drink 'til I'm full. Sing 'til I can't, 'til my voice is gone. And my head is spinning dizzy
english.segment8: If I'm out of my mind it's You, You. 'Cause I'm crazy in love with You, You. Inebriated by You, You. 'Cause I'm head over heels with You, You
